title: Text input
body: Text input allows the learner to input a text field into one of the items. This component can check whether you need items to be case sensitive, allow punctuation and allow items to be inserted in any order.
instruction: Name one type of plugin Adapt supports?

_feedback.correct: That's correct. Adapt allows the following plugins: A theme, components, extensions and a menu

_incorrect.final: This feedback will appear if you answered the question incorrectly.

_partlyCorrect.final: This feedback will appear if you answered part of the question correctly.
